# Carl Klein

Prior to pursuing a master's degree in data science at CU Boulder, Carl worked in the insurance industry for five years as a data analyst after receiving his bachelor's degree in mathematics from the University of Washington. When he's not in the mountains, he's fine tuning his data science skills. Carl aspires to integrate his passions of mathematics and programming in an Earth Sciences field, where he can study and uncover patterns involving natural phenomenon.
